info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 6 at 11:08AM EDT until April 9 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
East Fork White River.
Flatrock River near Columbus.
Driftwood River near Edinburgh.
.Major flooding will continue on the East Fork White. The crest on the East Fork was near Columbus this morning and should reach Seymour this evening and Rivervale on Tuesday. The Flatrock near Columbus should crest this afternoon, and the Driftwood at Edinburgh should crest tonight. The next chance for more than a tenth of an inch of rain does not return until Wednesday.
* WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record.
* WHERE...East Fork White River at Columbus.
* WHEN...Until early Wednesday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Approaching a record flood. State Road 46 closed. Evacuations are likely on homes north of SR 46. Flood waters affect businesses along SR 46. This is the approximate height of the 100 year flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM EDT Sunday was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 215 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON
